meanings.definition: The process of turning into a zombie.
meanings.sent1: After the zombification, he wandered aimlessly with vacant eyes.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the zombification of the infected individuals.
meanings.sent3: During the zombification, they all groaned for more brains!
meanings.sent4: The zombification of the town turned it into a ghostly place.
meanings.sent5: The slow zombification of the city's population was a terrifying sight.

meanings.definition: The act of making someone into a zombie.
meanings.sent1: The evil sorcerer performed the zombification ritual on his enemies.
meanings.sent2: The movie depicted the dark arts of zombification in a chilling manner.
meanings.sent3: The zombification of the party guests was a spooky prank gone wrong.
meanings.sent4: The cult leader's words had a zombification effect on his followers.
meanings.sent5: The gradual zombification of the protagonist added suspense to the story.
